mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SIMCO_ANALISIS_TEMA_ACTOR ( N_ID_ACTOR, N_ID_CASO,
N_NIVELACTORTEMA,
D_FECHAREGISTROACTORTEMA,
N_ID_TEMA ) VALUES ( #{actor.id}, #{caso.id},
#{nivel},
#{fechaRegistro},
#{tema.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SIMCO_ANALISIS_TEMA_ACTOR SET N_NIVELACTORTEMA = #{nivel}, D_FECHAREGISTROACTORTEMA = #{fechaRegistro} WHERE N_ID_ACTOR =#{actor.id} AND N_ID_CASO =#{caso.id} AND N_ID_TEMA =#{tema.id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.N_ID_ACTOR, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.N_ID_CASO, A.N_ID_TEMA, A.N_NIVELACTORTEMA FROM SIMCO_ANALISIS_TEMA_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE A.N_ID_TEMA =#{id}
